item.title: GloRilla Arrested on Felony Drug Possession Charges in Georgia Following Burglary Investigation at Her Home
item.description: Deputies said they found “a significant amount of marijuana” in the rapper’s home while investigating a burglary that happened earlier.

item.title: GloRilla Arrested on Felony Drug Charges the Night Before WNBA All-Star Performance
item.description: Rapper GloRilla was arrested on felony drug charges after a burglary occurred at her home near Atlanta on Saturday, according to Atlanta’s WSB-TV and TMZ — and then performed at the WNBA All-Star game
